description: Number of 2n-bead balanced binary necklaces of fundamental period 2n, equivalent to reversed complement, inequivalent to reverse and complement.
comments: Number of non-symmetric compositions of n, e.g. 4 can be written 1+3, 3+1, 1+1+2, or 2+1+1 (but not 4, 2+2, 1+2+1 or 1+1+1+1). - Henry Bottomley, Jun 27 2005
links: Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
author: _David W. Wilson_
